DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate diet modification adult undergoing chemotherapy non-small cell lung cancer . Half participant modify diet , half continue eat habitual diet .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Food Intake Modification Lung Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients newly confirm diagnosis nonsmall cell lung cancer schedule first line chemotherapy Patients compute tomography ( CT ) image , include scan 3rd lumbar region , take within 45 day initiation chemotherapy Confirmed dietary intake specific food group Canada 's Food Guide agespecific recommend number serving per day Ability maintain oral intake Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) Performance Status ≤2 / Karnofsky Performance Status 60100 Ability give write , informed consent Comorbidities would expect interfere primary outcome measure Patients long term drug supplement modify muscle metabolism Life expectancy < 3 month Individuals specific food intolerance allergies An inability comply study instruction Patients without compute tomography ( CT ) image , include scan 3rd lumbar region , take 2 cycle chemotherapy Patients engage total ≥50 minute moderatetovigorous cardiovascular exercise per week and/or structure resistance exercise occur ≥2 time per week
